mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE email= #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (email, password, name, phone, createdate, masteryn) VALUES(#{email},#{password},#{name},#{phone},#{createdate},#{masteryn});
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where userid = #{userid}

select FORMAT((AVG(Kindness) + AVG(cleanliness) + AVG(convenience) + AVG(Loc_satisfy)) / 4, 1) AS rating, (select name from user where user.userid = review.userid) as username, (SELECT hotelname from hotel where hotel.hotelid = review.hotelid) as hotelname, (SELECT kindhotel from hotel where hotel.hotelid = review.hotelid) as kindhotel, (select roomname from room where room.roomid = review.roomid) as roomname,(select rentalType from room where room.roomid = review.roomid) as rentalType,reviewcontent,ratingdate,reviewid from review where userid = #{userid} group by reviewid order by ratingdate desc
select imgID , hotelid, reviewid, imgdata from image where userid = #{userid}
